jdbcService.sql: update node_locations set modified = :modified, x = :x, y = :y, street_id = :streetId, city_id = :cityId, post_code_id = :postCodeId, country_id = :countryId, province_id = :provinceId, additional = :additional, number = :number, district_id = :districtId, first_name = :firstName, last_name = :lastName, priority = :priority, location_type_id = :locationTypeId, sector_id = :sectorId, node_id = :nodeId where id = :id
